text: namut “(pratiksepa karana) ovunva (obage janatava) oba kapa damanu. nætahot oba, obage nivasin (pita ratakata) pitatva yanu”yayi api ovunta niyama kara tibunahot ovungen samahareku hæra, (vædi deneku) mese karannema næta. ehet ovun siyallanma tamanta upades di æti paridi kara tibune nam, eya ovuntama itamat agana dæyak bavata patva tikhennata ida tibuni. tavada (visvasayehi ovunva) sthira karannatada ida tibuni
